Name: SOWON
About the game: Dream, time, and memories Mom and dad are disappeared! In the middle of night, while a girl woke up and wandering around home, she fell on the rusty garbage dump. Can Sowon go back to her world out from this strange world? ㅡGot an invitation from the ugliest doll! Can Sowon wake up if she would tumble and fall? In the toy world, beauty and fear coexist and all living things are toys. There also might be a toy you want. ㅡFind clues and solve puzzles with Sowon! There are many different puzzles in the toy world. Don't miss any tiny clues. Use magical tools to solve puzzles. ㅡMany of the world's ugliest dolls appear in this game. Go on a wonderful trip with toys in SOWON. Meet various dolls with crooked charm in the toy world! Unique puzzles and whole new places you've never been are waiting for you.
